item.title: The Papers: 'Trump's $1bn BBC threat' and 'You will pay the price' warning for Reeves
item.description: Donald's Trump's threat to sue the BBC over the editing of his speech in a documentary dominates Tuesday's papers.

item.title: Syria to join US-led coalition to defeat IS group after Trump meeting
item.description: Ahmed al-Sharaa, once branded a terrorist by the US, became the first Syrian leader to visit the White House.

item.title: Cryptoqueen who fled China for London mansion to be sentenced over Â£5bn Bitcoin stash
item.description: Qian Zhimin bought cryptocurrency using funds stolen from thousands of Chinese pensioners, say police.

item.title: Matt Smith and Nick Cave on bringing sex addict salesman to life in TV drama
item.description: The musician's tale of sex, guilt and grief has been reimagined as a TV series starring Matt Smith.

item.title: Nine tackles on Thursday, cancer surgery on Friday for Broncos' Singleton
item.description: Denver Broncos linebacker Alex Singleton is recovering from surgery following a testicular cancer diagnosis.
